page.title: 13MEDIA IN DUMFRIES (cont)
page.content: {SOLWAY RADIO IN DUMFRIES {TIME ON AIR:}Monday to Friday 7.00am to 7.30am and 12noon to 12.30pm {ADDRESS:}BBC Radio Solway,Lovers Walk, Dumfries,Scotland. {FREQUENCY:}In Dumfries and Galloway (except Stranraer)VHF is 92.5 and in Stranraer VHF 93.9 {ORGANISATION:}Radio Solway is a community Radio.It is one of five in Scotland,Radio Nanalan,Radio Shetland, Radio Orkney,Radio Tweed which is Radio Solways sister radio.Radio Scotland is Radio Solways mother station and it gives Radio Solway a daily budget.Radio Solway has been established since 1983.It broadcasts all over Dumfries & Galloway and to the North of Cumbria.Radio Solway employs 4 fulltime staff and around 20 freelance journalists.In the morning the programme is called"SOLWAY REPORT"
